name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Insert a message
Tonight in Shanghai Silu Huayu Community
Because of a positive case in Xuhui/Xietu Street/Community, the street sealed off the entire community. Residents protested and clashed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Municipal Party Secretary Yang Fasen appeared and promised that the low-risk communities would be unsealed tomorrow and he would personally go to the communities to solve the problem tomorrow.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In a residential area in Urumqi,
while the leader was speaking, residents broke open the railings and walked onto the street

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The mayor of Urumqi Xinshi District came out to persuade citizens to go home. However, citizens did not buy it and demanded an immediate lifting of the blockade.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Urumqi Shuimogou District 
Police went to check mobile phones and "verbally summoned" two owners on the charge of "inciting shouting" without any documents. The police were illogical and finally went directly into the owner's house to snatch the mobile phone and said it was "confiscation".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/0v9YsawWKb

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some local netizens said that this is not the city government building, but the headquarters of the 12th Division. We hereby correct this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some local netizens said that this is not the city government building, but the headquarters of the 12th Division. We hereby correct this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some local netizens said that this is not the city government building, but the headquarters of the 12th Division. We hereby correct this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens said that my latest videos are no longer visible. Is this true?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sorry for causing misunderstandings to some netizens. Due to a Twitter mechanism problem, I corrected it and said that this is not the city government but the division headquarters, which caused the previous content to be pushed back. Sorry

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
By the way, can you modify tweets if you buy a Twitter membership in the US? I will die if this function is not available.
Because a lot of information is to be clarified step by step, and many times some details will be wrong, but it will be very troublesome if there is no function to modify tweets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hello, Professor Li. I saw someone submit an article to you about the Xinjiang government arresting people, so I want to add a little more to that.
My roommate is Uyghur, and her friends in Xinjiang have also spoken out for the victims of the Urumqi massacre. Someone has already contacted her on WeChat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplementary Urumqi video
The time should be around 9:10 pm, the exact location is unknown
"Your behavior has violated the Emergency Response Law"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Just now, in a live broadcast, a citizen questioned the government leaders
"No matter whether we ordinary people are right or wrong, you should not enforce the law violently"
"You have lost even the minimum professional ethics of a public official"
"Are you considered a legal black force with power?"
The live broadcast was immediately shut down.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Let's briefly review the timeline of the Urumqi incident tonight:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of the 23rd, a major fire broke out in the Jixiangyuan community in Urumqi. The official report said that the incident caused 10 deaths. However, the outside world generally believes that the death toll is more than 20.
After more than 100 days of blockade, such a tragedy still occurred. Not only Urumqi, but also the whole country was very indignant. The incident was discussed very fiercely on the Internet. I don’t need to elaborate on the specific process.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the same day, a beating incident occurred in Lianxing Community of Xinjiang 104th Corps, which led to the residents of Lianxing Community gathering at the police station to demand the perpetrators to come forward. Afterwards, the angry residents came to the community to demand an explanation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: During this process, a man holding a red flag outside the community called on everyone to go to the streets to seek justice. Perhaps he was the flag man we saw later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The video of Lianxing Community spread quickly in the local community, and soon, various communities within the 104th Corps expressed their support.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Starting in the evening, police cars entered the community and asked citizens to go home one by one.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: However, the Lianxing community incident was getting worse. Crowds gathered under the national flag and sang the national anthem.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Xishan District, police formed a human wall to block the road, trying to prevent people from taking to the streets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/CIeav5zdGU

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this time, some netizens reported that the incidents around Lianxing Community have been basically settled, however

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The chain reaction of this incident has caused a shock throughout the city. In various communities in Urumqi, people took to the streets to demand the lifting of the blockade.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the video, the shooter said that there were people on and under the bridge, and people were seen waving national flags and heading towards the city government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the streets of the city, more and more people took to the streets

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some people came to the headquarters of the 12th Division (which they had mistakenly thought was the city government) and sang the national anthem.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Then they began to attack the division headquarters gate

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People shouted "unblocking" in front of the gate and then entered the division headquarters.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/hq5GmcErAc

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In front of the office building, Ma Zhijun, deputy secretary of the municipal party committee, came out to negotiate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Afterwards, because of the suspected signal jammer, no new news came from the division headquarters. After that, things were quite chaotic, and confrontations between police and the public occurred in many places.
In the early morning, a large number of police and some people confronted each other under an overpass.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In some places, there were more intense clashes between the police and the public.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, Yang Fasen, the municipal party secretary, came forward and promised to personally go to the community tomorrow to solve the problem.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As of now
It is said that most areas have returned to normal, but there should still be some residents outside
During the live broadcast at around 3 a.m., there were still a large number of people outside arguing with the city government leaders

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The above is the entire situation at present. For the time being, I have no news indicating that there have been any casualties among the public or police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The reason for the outburst of the people of Urumqi tonight is that after more than 100 days of lockdown, the people have been grudged for a long time. The way the Jixiangyuan fire was handled was undoubtedly the last straw that broke the camel's back for the people, making them completely disappointed in the government.
Finally, a fuse in Lianxing Community completely ignited the entire city.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the 24th, when the incident happened, many cities across the country were announcing a new round of city closures and silence. As a city with the most profound experience in maintaining stability in China, the situation tonight was obviously beyond the government's expectations. If the people of Urumqi were not intolerable, they would not have rashly taken to the streets. After this incident, if the government still insists on its own way and refuses to change, then Foxconn and Urumqi will trigger a larger-scale imitation effect.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Friendly reminder: If journalists from all over the world use my timeline and text content, please pay according to your newspaper's manuscript fee standards. It is not easy to organize, thank you for your understanding.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I really want to thank Twitter for this algorithm. After writing this, my homepage is as messy as my bedroom.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early hours of the morning, people took to the streets carrying national flags and shouting for the lifting of the lockdown.

Looking at the buildings, it should be before the confrontation with the police under the viaduct

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @AqWQWZ5NyIizaTp Xinjiang should use Beijing time if I remember correctly

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At around 6pm, in the group of cadres in charge of households in Urumqi's Yangzijiang Road Street, cadres were asked to provide valuable information, and after verification, they would be rewarded with 1,000 yuan in cash.
But now there should be no need to verify it anymore

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: During the day today, students from the Central Academy of Fine Arts smashed the test kits in the nucleic acid testing booth.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Speechless

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I need help suddenly
Are there any friends in Urumqi who are still awake?
A Twitter user just told me that he couldn't contact his friends in Urumqi about three hours ago. I asked a personal friend of mine and he last saw his friend's Moments update about three hours ago. I don't know if it's because he went to bed too late or there was an Internet outage in Urumqi
I hope to confirm this with everyone. If you have any news, please send me a private message.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
During the live broadcast of the flag-raising ceremony, people expressed their anger
"Open the door"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I will wake up at about 2:30 in China tomorrow morning. I will continue to follow the follow-up of Urumqi.
I hope each of us can do our little bit, because helping others is helping ourselves - many people asked me why I insist on doing this, this is the reason.
Thank you for your attention and support, good night.
